long_description: Out-haul, outlast and out-chill the competition with the 90 qt. wheeled Igloo Yukon Glide cooler. With room for food and drinks, it stand ups to the abuse that comes with your adventurous lifestyle. Rugged polyethylene construction with 3 in. of foam in the lid and 2 in. in the body provides excellent insulation to keep ice cold for up to 7 days in 90degF temperatures. Sturdy wheels and a convenient pull handle make it easy to get heavy loads in to your campsite. Rugged, wide integrated handles are easy to grasp with gloves on; handles double as tie-down loops. Raised, textured work surface on the lid; lid includes a measuring scale for determining whether or not your fish is a keeper. Oversize tethered drain plug for easy draining and cleaning. Elevated design allows airflow underneath the cooler to improve cooling performance. All stainless-steel hinge pins and hardware ensure many years of use. Lid on the Igloo Yukon Glide cooler can be locked shut for security (lock not included).
short_description: Out-haul, outlast and out-chill the competition with the 90 qt. wheeled Igloo Yukon Glide cooler. With room for food and drinks, it stand ups to the abuse that comes with your adventurous lifestyle.
